static prepare_tx(amount: float, to_address: str, from_address: str, last_ref: dict, fee: float = 0) → Tuple[TransactionV2, str, str][source]

Prepare a new transaction.

Parameters:

  • amount – Amount to send.

  • to_address – Destination DAG address.

  • from_address – Source DAG address.

  • last_ref – Dictionary with keys: ordinal, hash.

  • fee – Transaction fee.

Returns:

TransactionV2 object, sha512hash, rle.

static sign(private_key_hex: str, tx_hash: str) → str[source]

Create transaction signature.

Parameters:

  • private_key_hex – Private key in hex format.

  • tx_hash – Transaction hash from prepare_tx.

Returns:

Signature supported by the transaction API (@noble/secp256k1).
